actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to extend, for a period of two years, the authority for operation of the Department of Veterans Affairs regional office in Manila, the Republic of the Philippines.
short_title: Keeping Our Commitment to Overseas Veterans Act of 2018

summary.text:
Keeping Our Commitment to Overseas Veterans Act of 2018

This bill extends authority through FY2020 for operation of the Department of Veterans Affairs regional office in Manila, the Republic of the Philippines.

titles.title: A bill to extend, for a period of two years, the authority for operation of the Department of Veterans Affairs regional office in Manila, the Republic of the Philippines.
